name: Shroomian
description:
Hello and Welcome to Shroomian!

(Note: this is a school project and the first game I've ever done)

(Disclaimer: Upon trying to open this for the first time, Windows will give you a virus warning since this was made on GameMaker 8. I promise it's just the game and nothing malicious)

In this (very short) game you are a Mushroom Man on his first day as a warrior. Unfortunately, you are easily manipulated by old people. But they won't do that... Right?

Have Fun!

Credits

Sound Effects: cool people on youtube.

Everything else: me
